info.name: Portfolio backend API
info.description:
Postman collection to portfolio backend API.

Shows all endpoints and input data examples.

[https://github.com/LautaroColella/YP_PortfolioBackend](https://github.com/LautaroColella/YP_PortfolioBackend/tree/production)

request.description:
No authorization is required.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "email": string (> 3, < 255),
    "password": string (> 3, < 255)
}

```

This endpoint must be used to authenticate.

- **Success response body:** A bearer token to use as authorization mechanism
- **Success response status**: `200 OK`
- **Error response status:** `401 Unauthorized`

The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `/api/v1/login`.

The body is not required.

This endpoint must be used to validate the JWT.

- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response status:** `401 Unauthorized`

item.name: No auth

request.description:
The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

No body is required.

Request can't have any unsuccessfull response.

This endpoint must be used to get all the users in the user table.

- **Success response body:** An array of objects
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`

The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

No body is required.

The id parameter in the URL must be a positive number. A negative number or NaN returns an error response status of `401 Unauthorized`.

This endpoint must be used to get a specific user from the user table.

- **Success response body:** A user object
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `404 Not Found`

item.description: Endpoints where no authorization/authentication is required

request.description:
The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "name": string (> 3, < 255),
    "email": string (> 3, < 255),
    "password": string (> 3, < 255)
}

```

This endpoint must be used to add a user to the user table.

- **Success response body:** The created user object
- **Success response status:** `201 Created`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "id": number (> 0),
    "name": string (> 3, < 255),
    "email": string (> 3, < 255),
    "password": string (> 3, < 255)
}

```

This endpoint must be used to update a user that exist in the user table.

- **Success response body:** The updated user object
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

The id parameter in the URL must be a positive number. A negative number or NaN returns an error response status of `401 Unauthorized`.

The body is not required.

This endpoint must be used to delete a user that exist in the user table.

- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

item.name: No auth

request.description:
No authorization or body is required.

Request can't have any unsuccessfull response.

This endpoint must be used to get all the items in the about_item table.

- **Success response body:** An array of objects
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`

No authorization or body is required.

The id parameter in the URL must be a positive number. A negative number or NaN returns an error response status of `401 Unauthorized`.

This endpoint must be used to get an specific item from the about_item table.

- **Success response body:** An item object
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `404 Not Found`

item.description: Endpoints where no authorization/authentication is required

body.raw:
{
	"item_type": 1,
	"name": "Item name",
	"date": "2022-12-31",
	"description": "Item description. Can contain html tags for formatting",
	"link": "https://example.com/myCertUrl",
	"image_uri": "https://example.com/myimg.png",
	"image_alt": "Image description"
}

request.description:
The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "item_type": number [1, 2, 3],
    "name": string (> 3, < 255),
    "date": string (yyyy-MM-dd),
    "description": string (> 3, < 3000),
    "link": null | string (> 3, < 255),
    "image_uri": null | string (> 3, < 255),
    "image_alt": null | string (> 3, < 255)
}

```

This endpoint must be used to add an item to the about_item table.

- **Success response body:** The created item object
- **Success response status:** `201 Created`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

body.raw:
{
    "id": 1,
	"item_type": 1,
	"name": "Item name",
	"date": "2022-12-31",
	"description": "Item description. Can contain html tags for formatting",
	"link": "https://example.com/myCertUrl",
	"image_uri": "https://example.com/myimg.png",
	"image_alt": "Image description"
}

request.description:
The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "id": number (> 0),
    "item_type": number [1, 2, 3],
    "name": string (> 3, < 255),
    "date": string (yyyy-MM-dd),
    "description": string (> 3, < 3000),
    "link": null | string (> 3, < 255),
    "image_uri": null | string (> 3, < 255),
    "image_alt": null | string (> 3, < 255)
}

```

This endpoint must be used to update an item that exist in the about_item table.

- **Success response body:** The updated item object
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

The id parameter in the URL must be a positive number. A negative number or NaN returns an error response status of `401 Unauthorized`.

The body is not required.

This endpoint must be used to delete an item that exist in the about_item table.

- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

item.name: No auth

request.description:
No authorization is required.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "subject": string (> 3, < 255),
    "message": string (> 3, < 3000),
    "reply": string (> 3, < 255),
    "date": string (yyyy-MM-dd),
    "read": boolean [true, false]
}

```

This endpoint must be used to add a message to the contact_message table.

- **Success response body:** The created message object
- **Success response status:** `201 Created`
- **Error response body:** An error object
- **Error response status:** `400 Bad Request`

item.name: No auth

request.description:
No authorization or body is required.

Request can't have any unsuccessfull response.

This endpoint must be used to get all the information items in the information table.

- **Success response body:** An array of objects
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`

No authorization or body is required.

The id parameter in the URL must be a positive number. A negative number or NaN returns an error response status of `401 Unauthorized`.

This endpoint must be used to get an information item from the information table.

- **Success response body:** An information object
- **Success response status:** `200 OK`
- **Error response body:** An error object

item.description: Endpoints where no authorization/authentication is required

request.description:
The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

Body specifications:

``` json
{
    "name": string (> 3, < 255),
    "information": string (> 3, < 2000)
}

```

This endpoint must be used to add an information item to the information table.

- **Success response body:** The created information object
- **Success response status:** `201 Created`

The authorization must be of type `Bearer`.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

``` json
{
    "id": number (> 0),

    "information": string (> 3, < 2000),
}

```

This endpoint must be used to update an information item that exist in the information table.

The authorization must contain the given bearer token when authenticating to `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/login`.

The id parameter in the URL must be a positive number. A negative number or NaN returns an error response status of `401 Unauthorized`.

The body is not required.

- **Error response body:** An error object
